display_name: Trying not to be a cave goblin
note:
Bisexual man (he/him) & adult adoptee from the Midwest US. Striving to learn how to be anti-racist. Birdsite transplant. I'm actually mostly nice, just cynical & depressed/anxious.

Avatar: A picture of the Grinch (from the 2000 movie, played by Jim Carrey) with a scowl on his face. Like that character, I too am a "cave goblin": an introverted & misanthropic homebody. I guess I could use a little... social interaction.

Header: Artwork from the Rusty Lake game franchise.

Bisexual man (he/him) & adult adoptee from the Midwest US. Striving to learn how to be anti-racist. Birdsite transplant, formerly located at mastodon.lol. I'm actually mostly nice, just cynical & depressed/anxious.

Avatar: The Grinch (from the 2000 movie, played by Jim Carrey) with a scowl on his face. Like that character, I too am a "cave goblin": an introverted & misanthropic homebody. I guess I could use a little... social interaction.

name: Interests:
value: queer stuff; adoptee rights; climate action; trees; GIS; public policy; solidarity; music; comedy; learning cool stuff; video games (sometimes)

name: Fuck off:
value: Assholes, including but not limited to: fascists; racists; ableists; queerphobes (including TERFs/FARTs); adoptionsplainers (ask if you don't understand)

name: Fandoms:
value: Star Trek; Stargate; Doctor Who; Futurama; Cracked After Hours; Buzzfeed Unsolved / Watcher (Shaniac); Skyrim; Mass Effect; Rusty Lake; The Room (Fireproof Games)

name: May allow follows / follow back if:
value: You're not a jerk & you have bio info, metadata, or a pinned post that tells me you're a real human & we have some common interests. It helps if we've actually interacted at some point so I have some frame of reference.
